all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For it is expedient that I, the Lord, should make every man accountable, as a steward over earthly blessings, which I have made and prepared for my creatures.
Doctrine and Covenants 104:13
Quote of the Day
"How different life could be if the world esteemed Jesus above the level of a profane swearing streak from time to time."
President Jeffrey R. Holland | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
